name: 高等影像處理
description: 本課程含蓋高階的影像處理相關研究及應用技術的介紹與探討.專注在理論及計算技術的發展並提供重要技術詳細的演算法.
goals: Build theoretical concepts of image processing
Focus on computational techniques for 2D and 3D images
Provide detailed algorithmic and theoretical treatments
syllabus:
本課程介紹數位影像處理的相關技術，包括影像強化、影像平滑化、雜訊過濾、 Fourier轉換、影像分割、邊緣偵測、特徵擷取等技術的說明與介紹。搭配程式作業的要求，期望學生能了解並實作各種影像處理技術。

課程內容如下: 

Ch1: Course overview; Introduction

Ch2: Digital image fundamentals

    including image sensing and acquisition; image sampling and quantization; some basic relations between pixels,...

Ch3: Image enhancement in the spatial domain

    including some basic gray level transformations; histogram processing; enhancement using arithmetic/logic operations; smoothing spatial filters; sharpening spatial filters;...

Ch4: Image enhancement in thefrequency domain

    including Fourier transform and Frequency domain; smoothing frequency-domain filters; sharpening frequency domain filters; homomorphic filtering;...

Ch5: Image restoration    

Ch6: Color image processing

    including color model; color transformations; smoothing and sharpening; color segmentation

Ch7: Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing

本課程每堂上課前皆有測驗，上課請勿遟到，且所有作業皆為程式作業，另期末需上台報告。

教科書:Image processing Analysis, and Machine Vision, 4th edition, Milan Sonka, Vaclav Hlavac, Roger Boyle, Cengage Learning, 2015.
